jobProfiles.name: quickMARC - Derive a new SRS MARC Bib and Instance
jobProfiles.description: This job profile is used by the quickMARC Derive action to create a new SRS MARC Bib record and corresponding Inventory Instance. It cannot be edited or deleted.

jobProfiles.name: Default - Create SRS MARC Authority
jobProfiles.description: Default job profile for creating MARC authority records. These records are stored in source record storage (SRS). Profile cannot be edited or deleted

jobProfiles.name: Default - Create Holdings and SRS MARC Holdings
jobProfiles.description: Default job profile for creating MARC holdings and corresponding Inventory holdings. Profile cannot be edited or deleted

jobProfiles.name: quickMARC - Create Holdings and SRS MARC Holdings
jobProfiles.description: This job profile is used by the quickMARC to allow a user to create a new SRS MARC holdings record and corresponding Inventory holdings. Profile cannot be edited or deleted

jobProfiles.name: Default - Create instance and SRS MARC Bib
jobProfiles.description: This job profile creates SRS MARC Bib records and corresponding Inventory Instances using the library's default MARC-to-Instance mapping. It can be edited, duplicated, or deleted.

jobProfiles.name: Inventory Single Record - Default Create Instance
jobProfiles.description: Triggered by an action in Inventory, this job profile imports a single record from an external system, to create an Instance and MARC record

jobProfiles.name: Inventory Single Record - Default Update Instance
jobProfiles.description: Triggered by an action in Inventory, this job profile imports a single record from an external system, to update an existing Instance, and either create a new MARC record or update an existing MARC record
